unnormalised: Flash sales, huh? They're like the *DDLJ* romance - exciting but fleeting! You gotta be quick like Raj reaching for Simran on that train. But seriously, sometimes the "sale" price isn't even that great. Remember last Diwali when I thought I'd scored a killer deal on a Sabyasachi-esque saree? Turns out, it was available for almost the same price a week later! So, caveat emptor, bhaiyon aur behnon! What say you all from IIT Bombay?
